website_summaries.verdict: A cozy, well-made mattress topper with supportive yet soft cushioning.
pros: Most users felt this option kept them cool and comfortable, providing good cushioning and softness
Some said it helped with back pain
It stands out for being made of quality materials and being easy to put on
We love that it lacks odor and comes with its own quilted enclosure
cons: A few felt that the topper didn't keep them as cool as expected

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Mattress Topper!
customer_reviews.text: I have added a video so please watch to see it in action! I purchased the king size mattress topper. It has plenty of support and the foam is plent soft. The pad was designed well. I bought this to soften an extra firm mattress. Im always hesitant when I see 1 star reviews but if you have amazon prime, just get it and try it out. If you don't like it you can alway return it. I stopped by home on my lunch break and opened everything up to air out. It came tightly rolled and wrapped. It probably took a good 5 hours to completely fluff up. GET ONE!
customer_reviews.author: Arzante

customer_reviews.title: Wally approves
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper is so comfortable and doesn’t trap heat. My dog loves it and will now not leave the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly soft
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for about a week and we are sleeping great on it. The foam is incredibly soft. We had a pretty good pillow top mattress before but it was nothing like this. In fact the foam is so thick that I suspect you could put this on a very cheap mattress and it would still feel great. Very easy to put on the bed too, it fit perfectly and the pillow top has deep pockets so it will fit over the foam, your mattress, and whatever else you have on the bed easily. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Capece

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade for aging body in recovery
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my very firm mattress to recover after hip surgery. After first night I had a backache, but after the second night I couldn't wait to get into bed. A definite upgrade for aging body. My pooch also loves the softer lay! There was no "gassing" odor that other subscribers complained about with other foam toppers. The additional pillow top cover also adds layer of softness if desired. The pillow top cover does not have absorbent protection and foam will absorb liquids, so I suggest using protective cover with or without pillow top. My deep pocket sheets were able to handle the additional thickness, so no need to purchase new sheets if you already have them.
customer_reviews.author: dale dawson

customer_reviews.title: ... it wasn't what I expected the seller has a great refund policy I would give the seller a 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Although it wasn't what I expected the seller has a great refund policy I would give the seller a 5 star review. If you like extra padding and the felling of sinking into a cloud you would probably love this product however if you are like my husband and like more stiff support this product is probably not for you.
customer_reviews.author: ashley justice

customer_reviews.title: Firmness and quality
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected! It’s flimsy and only 2 inches of cheap foam, and the top is like a half inch sheet on top. I hate to return online stuff , I had it for 1 night! I will definitely return this! It’s not worth $200, feels like a $50 topper. I will return and order a firm 5 inch foam mattress and use it as a topper on my 8 inch foam mattress I already have .
customer_reviews.author: Timcat

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great and Durability lacking
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully soft and plush. Make sure you use the cover though because if dirt gets to that foam your not getting it out. It adjusts quickly to pressure and bounces back nicely. The foam on mine came cracked and that's really disappointing. The seller contacted me and they are replacing the ripped foam. So I am changing my rating to 5stars. I really love the feel of this topper. And the customer service with how quickly they responded and willing to make the product right is excellent. Thanks for making my nights sleep better
customer_reviews.author: kayshabay

customer_reviews.title: 2 1/2” foam plus 1 1/2” cover
customer_reviews.text: I think the ad is a bit misleading. Overall 4” includes the memory foam and the cover. It’s not the memory foam alone. Yes, the memory foam does have a smell. The cover helps a bit but if you are a stomach sleeper you will have that smell in your face for several days. The cover is one of the nicest parts because it is separate from the memory foam (which allows you to wash it) and has super deep pockets that allow you to cover the memory foam and your mattress. The cover is not waterproof though. To protect the memory foam, I added a waterproof layer between the foam and the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Moltj

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I hate giving bad reviews, but when I do, it is warranted. I had an excellent memory foam pad that was pushing its age, so did some shopping and got sucked into the marketing of this one. This isn't memory foam, and it isn't good. I have had it for less than a month and already where I sleep is a significant depression. I often wake and roll over to the other side for some relief. Also, the "memory foam" pad is 2 inches, then they give you a topper that is 2 inches, which is essentially a low grade pillow. I wish I kept the box cause returning this is gonna suck.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: NOT 4 inches. 2.5 at best.
customer_reviews.text: Im actually disappointed. This is not 4 inches. The foam itself is 2 inches thick and the cover adds maybe another half inch. Correct measurements need to be posted to avoid disappointment. Im searching for another mattress pad to replace this one or will put another underneath it. Smh. It's comfort is ok for 2 inches but its not enough. And yes i let it expand for 2 days before i used it. Didnt matter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and fits my mattress perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard and uncomfortable mattress and wake up frequently with neck and back pain (im 25). This topper is very soft and forms to your body. I've slept on it 3 nights now and so far have not had any back pain! Only thing is that the memory foam gives off a chemical odor so I advise you to let it air out for a day or 2 before placing on your bed. UPDATE: I have had this mattress topper for almost 3 months now and still no complaints! It is unbelievably comfortable! Worth every cent in my book!
customer_reviews.author: H. Pryor

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not for me (us)...
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a quality product and was "comfortable" to sleep on (we have given it some time to try to adapt to it), unfortunately for my wife and I, we did not prefer this topper after several months. It may just be our mattress, which we are replacing with a Saatva (Luxury Firm). If you like extra cushy padding and the feeling of sinking into a cloud "marshmallow" you will most likely love this product...if you prefer much more firm/stiff support then this product is probably not for you. It did do a great job of keeping us warm on cold nights and cool in warmer temperatures. Like a lot of these reviews, this is just our humble opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Aquaman

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Not quite sure how to review this as the foam under padding has a tremendous chemical smell that even hanging outside in the sun has not removed. I missed the return window by a few days and I’m disappointed that I can’t send it back even though the smell has rendered it useless. If you have any kind of sensitivity to smells, this is not the product for you.!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Nagy

customer_reviews.title: Viscosoft Warrenty Issues - no customer service available
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the product which I purchased Oct. 28, 2019, now it's March 30, 2020. Two days ago, I went to remove mattress topper cover to wash and to my surprise, my topper/foam is completely slit in the middle of the topper. I have been attempting to contact the manufacture to have a replacement sent as a warranty is 3 years. I cannot get through to number provided on the warranty card? This is concerning that I will not be able to get a replacement. No customer service available which is a problem. My rating is based on quality of product and no assistance in customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Machado

customer_reviews.title: Great product! -Very high quality materials -Easy to assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! -Very high quality materials -Easy to assemble -Made our bed feel like a 5 Star Hotel! :) -Would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Anna Medica

customer_reviews.title: Pleasaantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised with this purchase. I find this topper makes my current Bed in A Box mattress feel as of I'm sleeping in a hotel! In a great way. I find the topper to be more on the medium to soft side. It gives.just enough without sagging. I'm a very large person and I was afraid it wouldn't support my weight but it does. I was having incredible lower back pain after sleeping all night and I tossed.and turned frequently. Not anymore. I've had the topper about 3 weeks and my back pain is al.ist none existant and I hardly toss and turn. The matress pad is exceptionally great quality. Well worth the money! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joyannmadd

customer_reviews.title: Best bed topper for support and cushioning.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is well worth the money you pay as I have had a very bad back lately and needed both support and enough cushioning. This product is truly supporting me when I lay on my side which our last foam topper (Costco) didn’t do at all. This one seems to be cushionybyet supportive due to the gel infusion into the foam. It’s much denser than a regular foam cushion but not in a firm way. The denser portion helps it not collapse when you lay on it but just lets it truly support your body where it needs it. So glad I spent the extra money!!
customer_reviews.author: HC777

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Plush
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Extremely soft. Like sleeping on a cloud. - Has held up well over the past several months - The smell only lasts a few days - Nice for side-sleeping - The fitted topper sheet is really nice and smooth Cons: - Actually too soft for back sleeping or stomach sleeping. It feels like your mid-section sinks into the material too much to be able to lie completely flat (I weigh 135 pounds, so it's not like I'm putting a lot of weight onto it). Because of the back-sleeper issue, I gave it 4 stars, but this is an excellent mattress topper for a side-sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: JER071113

customer_reviews.title: Thin, and top not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The foam with this product is low density, which means it squishes down very easily. If you don't need much padding at all, it might be fine, but most people will want higher-density foam, maybe 4 or 5 pound foam. The description says it comes with a plush top that's 1.5" thick. It's maybe 1/4 to 1/2inch thick uncompressed, and it will compress down into almost nothing.
customer_reviews.author: AlexR

customer_reviews.title: I have slept the best that I have in about a month
customer_reviews.text: Out of 4 different ones that I purchased this ones a keeper. I have slept the best that I have in about a month. I have a semi firm mattress and I am a side sleeper. This has helped immensely. Took a little getting used to because it's so soft. But it works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great buy I used this instead of buying a new ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy I used this instead of buying a new bed, not disappointed. I literally tore my bed apart and redid the mattress top. Mine is very plush I may add something later for a little more firmness. My husband is very happy feels like a brand new bed he weighs 187 6ft, me 143. I'm a side sleeper with chronic back leg and hip pain. Usually takes me 2hrs to get moving in the morning due to my body being locked up. I did not wake up through the night the last 2 nights still painful when I get up in morning but today was alot better.
customer_reviews.author: Drobertson

customer_reviews.title: Sleep on a cloud of pure joy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had mattress toppers in the past. Not one compared to this brand. My husband and I woke up the following morning with no aches and pains. I stopped taking my usual ibuprofen before bed and we wake up refreshed on my cloud of pure joy. So impressed are we that we also bought the pillows in queen, 3 days later. No king size pillows? Another piece of heaven as memory foam pillows can be so hard but these can mold to your head. We are so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A Music Fan

customer_reviews.title: ViscoSoft delivers what it promises
customer_reviews.text: After having 2 spinal surgeries, I was in need of a lot of cushioning but enough firmness to still be able to roll out of bed with ease. My ViscoSoft gel memory foam mattress does all and more. The mattress topper gives me an added layer of softness. For the longest time I was using an air mattress on top of my conventional mattress and box springs to get just the right amount of softness/firmness. My ViscoSoft takes care of all my needs. Since I have had my new ViscoSoft, I have not needed to clean it. When the time arrives, I will follow the instructions included with the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If mattresses were peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: We slept on this one night, er, we tried to sleep on this one night, but it was awful. It was like sleeping on a mattress made of peanut butter. The edges of the mattress were up higher than the middle 'cause you sunk in, so you had to literally roll up hill to change positions. We called first thing this morning and it's going back. Fortunately, Amazon is always wonderful to work with and they are giving us a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaCath

customer_reviews.title: reputable company, superior product
customer_reviews.text: I searched long and hard before making my purchase for this topper. I am thrilled with the product as it has exceeded my expectations! There was minor flaw in the foam and I contacted the company and they are sending another which is remarkable as so many companies will just ignore the problems and hope you will go away! I cannot say enough good things about the company and its product as I am sleeping so much more comfortably now. I had bought a firm Winkbed mattresss and it was causing all sorts of back and shoulder discomfort. Problem is solved now.
customer_reviews.author: merlbert

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like sleeping in heaven, it's so FLUFFY, it only took a few hours for the foam to get to it's full shape and the feather topper we fluffed by hand and encased everything into a new dust mite/ waterproof slipcover and its awesome, everything fits my queen bed perfectly nothing moves around, and all I have to actually clean is the slipcover and sheets. The first night sleep was rough due to not being used to the softness, but now we are weeks into sleeping on it and we couldn't be happier better than paying 500 for a new top mattress!!!!!!!! Reccomend definitely
customer_reviews.author: JerriLynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely most comfortable bed topper ever . Use it in my motorhome on every bed.
customer_reviews.author: Hemichick

customer_reviews.title: Relieves pressure on my hips while I am sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I have had back issues for many years, and had surgery to fuse my spine. So I never get a good night's sleep. I bought this mattress topper in hopes of relieving some of the pressure on my low back and hips. I have a foam mattress and while it "gives" a little, if I lay in one position for too long, it creates pressure points. This topper has relieved the pressure on my hips since I am a side sleeper. I still wake up with some back pain, but I really don't think there is anything that can be done to eliminate that. I am sleeping much better than before, so I am glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely happy. I was even happier the first week I got the mattress cover. It turned my bed into a new bed. I have back issue and it gives me all the support I need.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit, and it's ugly.
customer_reviews.text: It's too comfortable to send back. But it does not fit the mattress I bought the so-called Pillow Top for. Looking at it, it's plainly too small for the queen-sized Casper mattress, which was too hard and uncomfortable without it. It looks like it shrunk. The photos make it loook like it alligns perfectly with the mattress, but it does not. If I had to do it over, I'd get a King-size topper for my Queen-sized bed. It's ugly, but I can't sleep on the mattress without the ugly topper. Hiss boo on the sizing. Hooray for the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: J R Compton

customer_reviews.title: Mimimal outgassing, maximum comfort
customer_reviews.text: We bought this topper because we were disappointed with our new mattress. Although there were chemical odors when we unwrapped it, they dissipated after a few days of airing it out. This topper does a tremendous job of minimizing the transference of motion when either my husband or I shifts position, allowing the other to remain asleep. The cooling gel must work, as I have had no complaints of the bed being "too hot". My only issue is that I now really have to "climb" into bed, since this adds height to an already tall mattress, but I would not trade it for a shorter topper.
customer_reviews.author: M. Matel

customer_reviews.title: If you are searching for the perfect topper end your search here. You have found it.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even had the thing 24 hours. I literally just opened the box and I'm in heaven. I've been looking for the perfect topper and pad for my mattress since August. I was so skeptical about buying offline so I checked the stores and wasn't pleased. I almost passed it up because of the price. I'm cheap but this was worth the cost. This thing hasn't even had time to fully form and I'm in love with it. If you are searching for the perfect topper end your search here. You have found it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this mattress topper. Top quality and very impressive. After 2 nights, I wonder why I didn't purchase this sooner. So supportive and comfortable. My body doesn't ache in the mornings, like it usually does. I stays cool and I haven't woke up sweating. There are some reviews about an odor from manufacturing. There was a slight odor but resolved after one night and it wasn't unbearable. Just like anything with fabric that is new. It was very easy to unpack. I purchased the king. I was concerned it would not cover the whole mattress but after the memory foam expanded it cover the entire area. An excellent purchase and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: SuzTru

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover is a life saver!! I bought a new king size mattress and HATED IT! It was soooooo firm, I laid on the mattress until 3 A.m. so disgusted that I couldn't sleep, I got on Amazon and ordered this mattress topper! It arrived and I couldn't get it on my bed soon enough. After letting it inflate (it looked so small right out of the box) I put it on my bed and loved it! Its soft but not so soft that it engulfs you. By far my best purchase yet!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Odd tears after a few months
customer_reviews.text: We received this 5 months ago. We have loved it for the comfort it added to our mattress. We put the cotton topper on it when we first placed it on the bed. Today I removed the topper to wash it along with our featherbed and discovered huge tears along one side that go almost all the way through. I can't imagine how that could have happened. My husband and I are not big people ( we both weigh less than 150) so it certainly isn't a weight issue. We will turn it over to see if we can make it last. Up until today I thought it was 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Plus
customer_reviews.text: I bought this topper to replace another that had flattened. I highly recommend this ViscoSoft Gel Memory Foam. It arrived the next day as promised. I unrolled it and lay it on the floor, and by the next morning the few kinks were gone. There was absolutely no odor as some toppers seem to have. Made in the USA. So very comfortable. You can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Roach

customer_reviews.title: If you like to sleep you need this.
customer_reviews.text: This thing turned our crappy Salvation Army mattress into a luxurious 5 star hotel mattress. No more shifting from my side to my back to my side again because my hip/shoulder/back hurts. Air it in the garage for a week first, because it has an unpleasant smell when you first unwrap it. We've had it for a few months now and haven't had any problems, unless you count not wanting to get out of bed ever. You may need a taller fitted sheet. We used an inexpensive king sheet on a queen bed and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Transformed my bed!
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to hope that any topper would be of much use to us. Our mattress is super firm and I've gotten soft. I have tried 4" memory foam toppers before, and they helped but they didn't recover and made it difficult to move around. However, these toppers have transformed our old hard mattress into a comfortable cloud of slumber. I highly recommend this for anyone who has an uncomfortable bed. These two pieces become "one" with each other and the old mattress. They don't separate or slide around. I don't get sucked into this topper at all. It's really quite magical. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete product/ Big money.
customer_reviews.text: Total price after taxes $180 + Nice quality but ... came brand new with one foam retention strap missing. After tearing down the bed clothes , unpacking the topper, assembling the topper , I found the “absence of one corner strap”. I called Amazon and they wanted me to repack the damaged goods and send it all back and get a replacement. Too much to ask, you can’t repack the memory foam because it comes vacuumed packed and when opened it expands and it very heavy. So I guess I’m stuck with this incomplete product because I can’t return it!
customer_reviews.author: vivian-lee mozuch

customer_reviews.title: Way too soft!!
customer_reviews.text: I asked for a med. Hard topper what I got was a very too soft topper. You sink into it ,actually is hard to roll over in bed and, get out of bed. Didn't like it at all. Unfortunately I missed the window for return because, I had company for two weeks and lost track of time. Had to remove it from the bed everyone hated it. Now sits in my closet in the box it came in. Wasted $ 146.00 .
customer_reviews.author: joyce cardoni

customer_reviews.title: Toxic smell
customer_reviews.text: It was one of the worst experiences. I put memory foam to expand for 2 days, seemed to be good. I put it on my mattress, then topper. Next morning I woke up with huge headache, my eyes was red, all my skin was itching. This memory foam has such a horrible toxic smell. I had to wash my pillows, blankets, bedding sheets. But I can’t wash my mattress!!! It stinks! I want to sue this people for selling such a dangerous product!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia S

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this mattress cover and how it fits. Would like to return it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this mattress topper. It doesn’t fit very well at all. I’ve tried it on two different beds and have the same results. I would really like to return it and try to purchase something else. Tied of fighting it to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Furry

customer_reviews.title: Too hot for me!
customer_reviews.text: Sleeping on this mattress topper was just too hot. The cooling effect from the memory foam could not really penetrate through the pillow top cover. I have taken the pillow top cover off the memory foam, covered the memory foam with a very light weight topper. Now I can feel the coolness all night long. So far neither of my hips have been hurting as well. I wish I would just have bought a memory foam for a lot less money and not this product. Update AFTER 2 months of using this product there no longer any coolness. If fact I wake up ion a hot feeling topper. Sorry I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell
customer_reviews.text: within a few weeks I started to notice a terrible smell in my room. I finally figured out that it was the mattress foam topper. It seems to be deteriorating. It smells like moldy mulch fertilizer. The company refuse to refund my money or take the product back. I will no longer be doing business with the Visco soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P

customer_reviews.title: Turned a bad mattress into a great one!
customer_reviews.text: I Read all the reviews before buying this and decided to take a chance anyway. It is GREAT!!! It fits perfect because you have to unroll it and pull it to make it fit. By the time you add the 3" foam plus the 1" down topper, it is actually a 4" topper. I already had a high frame with a thick mattress. I think that I may need to get me a set of dog steps for my side now. Haha. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was prompted by them to order this mattress topper. It came yesterday and I immediately put it on the bed. Everything fit so well, there was no strange odors (some other cover reviews had odor issues). It was SO comfortable! Love the loft it gave to the mattress! My sheets fit over all of this with no problems. Winner! PS...Love that it is manufactured in the USA
customer_reviews.author: too busy to shop in stores

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for 4 months. We noticed it seemed like it was breaking down. We inspected the topper and found it to have many cracks and was showing signs of deteriorating. For 200.00 this topper should last longer than 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: F. W. Burris

customer_reviews.title: Does not loose support after use
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous topper that I purchased at walmart that seemed to loose all support in the areas that were used the most. This lead to an uneven surface; the area I laid was soft but next to me was still firm. This topper does not have such problem after 1 year, and if it does it's not noticeable! Very good topper seems to be the perfect balance between firmness and give. Mattress did have a slight smell for a few hours when opening but it dissipates quickly. I bought this to put on an old lumpy mattress instead of buying new and I'm glad I did. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Reiss

customer_reviews.title: Worst Topper!
customer_reviews.text: Hard has a rock! I wake up in pain, takes forever to fall asleep, both of my arms, legs and torso have been numb and tingling from being a side sleeper on this! If you like a very firm mattress topper then this is for you. My quality of sleep has been horrible! I'm now having to get steroid injections to help with the inflammation and paying I get feeling back in my arms and legs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin L Booe

customer_reviews.title: Low density foam made the experience worse
customer_reviews.text: Way too soft. It felt like my hard mattress became a 30yr old mattress that we were sinking into. Smelled pretty bad even after a week.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Tyler

customer_reviews.title: This uses low density foam
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to have to say it as I wanted this to be something that I could enjoy. But I have tried many many bedding products. And my eyes have been forced open in this regard. This one uses a low density foam. Some people in the industry don't understand that low density foam creates a cheap low quality softness that makes you sink in too much. It feels very thin when laid on .The key to high quality here is increasing the density without loosing softness. This is why tempurpedic stuff is still the best on the market, because they can do that. That is what gives you the feeling of resting on clouds.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander R. Baggett

customer_reviews.title: foam split into two pieces
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress topper for my son to use in his college dorm room. When we received it, we unpacked it to inspect it and wash the pillow top. We then stored it until we needed to move him in. When moving day came and we went to pack the foam in the car, we noticed that the foam had split into two pieces. This is the third memory foam mattress topper we have purchased. The other two have lasted for years and several trips to and from college. I am very disappointed in this product and would not recommend its purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mark barros

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted this for a long time but o was afraid a softer bed would be bad for my back. I was wrong. This topper is great! It’s two layers, with the gel layer on bottom then a fluffy mattress protector on top. The two pieces work well together. We are both sleeping so much better. Also it comes in Cal King which is often hard to find anywhere else. And this is about half the price of similar ones at retail Update. Bought another one for guest room as we like it so much. Tried one from Costco and it wasn't nearly as good so had to return that.
customer_reviews.author: AMZN2000

customer_reviews.title: We love this mattress
customer_reviews.text: We love this mattress! It is super comfortable and we now are getting more sleep and waking up with no aches or pains like before. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jayhawk714

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my old mattress last a little longer, which it did. I purchased a new mattress in Nov. 2019 and even though it was a good mattress it wasn't comfortable enough. I put this mattress topper on the new mattress and it made a world of difference. I slept the best I had in years. Worth the money. The quilted part is machine washable and dryer friendly and the gel infused memory foam is a generous 4". I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: slmatteson

customer_reviews.title: Best topper for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress topper!! It was just what I needed to get a good night sleep. I have a sleep number bed without all the bells and whistles. I would not buy one again but since it was a big investment I needed something to extend the life of my sleep number bed. This topper was just right. I am no longer in pain at night while I’m sleeping. No hip and shoulder pain. I feel like I’m sleeping on a cloud and I wait up feeling rested instead of lethargic and stiff. I love it and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: World of Difference
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of buying a cheap king sized spring mattress online when we moved into our new home. Fast forward 2 years and many backaches later, I was fed up with tossing and turning on a hard mattress and decided to invest in a topper. I read the reviews and decided on the 4in ViscoSoft. Between the super fluffy top cover and the gel memory foam core, it feels like a whole new mattress. I love sleeping on it. It fit really well over my mattress and was easy to set up. It turned our cheap spring mattress into a luxury bed. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: NOT 4 inches!
customer_reviews.text: This memory foam mattress topper is not 4 inches of memory foam. It’s my fault for not reading more closely. I wasn’t looking for a mattress pad to count as almost half of the thickness of my memory foam topper. I wanted soft, so I let myself be distracted from the rest of the description. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: LitTeach

customer_reviews.title: Best Topper
customer_reviews.text: I have a firm mattress, and it was causing my hip and shoulder to ache. I'd wake up every morning feeling tired and achy. I kept going to the chiropractor, and I couldn't figure out why I was hurting so bad. Then a friend mentioned my bed was too hard and I should try a mattress topper. I bought the ViscoSoft 4-Inch Topper and the very first night I noticed a huge difference. I woke up with no aches! I slept on it the second night and I work up feeling even better. This is a much less expensive way to go than buying a new mattress. I'm so glad I found a reasonable solution.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gaare

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was so worth the buy, and I was reading so many reviews, and all different places to buy, and so glad I bought this one. It puffed up almost instantly, and couldn’t wait the 24 before lying in it, so we did sleep on it that night. The smell wasn’t bad the first night, but the second night it was bad for me, but it only happened that one night. It is so comfortable, only had it about two weeks now, but I’m very satisfied, and my husband and I sure wake up a lot less stiff in the morning, especially when I have fibromyalgia.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this topper! My hips feel much better. It’s super comfortable. I do wish the white cover was a little more snug around my mattress though. There is a slight odor but it has been diminishing over the past week that I have owned it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Photo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled
customer_reviews.text: It’s mostly memory foam and impossible to get back in the box to return and too expensive. No pressure relief at all just compressible fluff. Astronauts may love memory foam but how much gravity do they have to deal with? And they are generally young and arthritis free. Memory foam swishes flat, no support at all. I’ll be giving the foam to the thrift store and keeping the mattress topper, it is quite a a nice mattress topper minus the foam, thus three stars.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: An Added Layer of Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I know we need a new mattress, but this mattress topper has made the bed comfortable again and extended the life of the mattress. I initially bought a ViscoSoft mattress topper for our bed and absolutely love it. Consequently, I got one for the guest bed, too. The toppers are very well-made and easy to add to the beds. The price is surprisingly reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lively

customer_reviews.title: I believe I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my ViscoSoft 4" mattress topper. Its 2.5" of foam and 1.5" of fiber filled pad seems a perfect design: soft yet supportive. The bed is now so compliant I don't need to shift every 15 minutes to stay comfortable. And I don't wake up sweating in the middle of the night because the fiber pad can breath. My traditional Serta mattress is old but still clean and in great shape, so a topper was a great way to update it. The well made skirt was a major selling point for me, as opposed to corner straps or nothing at all, as it keeps the layers aligned.
customer_reviews.author: Bob H.

customer_reviews.title: I can finally sleep again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had multiple neck surgeries and I constantly tossed and turned from pain, nightly, never any relief. It has been over a month of constant sleeping on this memory foam and I have slept more soundly than I have in literally years. I even wear a Fitbit to bed and it shows how restful my sleep is. This is absolutely worth the money, which is also very reasonable. We will be purchasing for our kids too! Thank you for giving me back my sleep!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Bushey

customer_reviews.title: Very glad I have this
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It arrived almost immediately, very well packaged and compressed to a manageable size. I have found it completely comfortable and it will clearly stay so for a very long time. It happened that a few weeks after getting this mattress, I became horribly ill for a month and ‘took to my bed’. It shows no ill effects at all from almost constant use. I am very surprised and obviously pleased at this circumstance. I find this to be an extremely high quality product, well worth the money. BTW, I suffer bad allergies, including chemical allergies, but the gave me no trouble from the first.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Christine

customer_reviews.title: very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is a super comfy mattress topper but definitely very soft. If you are looking for any kind of firm supporting topper, this is not it. The big issue I have with this topper is it doesn't stay on our mattress at all. I probably can go 2-3 nights before I wake up with it coming off again. It is super annoying to wake up to find that the lower mattress is exposed. The soft part on top of the memory foam bunches and wrinkles really easily as well, leaving creases. Overall not impressed but I will try to give it a shot for a while, maybe it needs to be broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Holy Cow what a difference
customer_reviews.text: My wife complains that the new mattress was just not soft enough. Well I just spent $1,500 on that mattress so I was not buying another one so I took to the reviews on amazon. I found this Mattress topper and took a chance. WOW...I freakin LOVE this topper. I will NEVER again go without one.
customer_reviews.author: SrMac

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mom (88) and Dad (90) ... they have had much better sleep. Dad likes softer, while Mom prefers more firm. Both have been sleeping better.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Milholland

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was waking with stiffness and difficulty moving in the morning. My mattress is old, but spending $1,500+ for a new one was not an option. I ordered this mattress topper based on positive reviews on Amazon and the Viscosoft websites. The product arrived on time. Quality materials and made in the USA. I aired it out 10 hours using my ceiling fan, rather than the suggested 24-48 hours even though there was no noticeable odor. The next morning I awoke without stiffness! I was surprised that I would feel so much better so quickly. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had 10 back surgeries...
customer_reviews.text: and we needed to replace our 12 year old Sleep Number memory foam as my back pain was becoming so bad I couldn’t sleep. After a lot of research I decided to try this one and I don’t regret it! It took a couple of nights to get used to it, but by the third night I slept right through the night! We were seriously looking at new mattresses, but this pad makes our old SN bed feel like new! Feels like a new mattress and saved a few $! No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha A. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I don't know how I slept without one for all these years. Easy to install too
customer_reviews.author: Nick Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I spent quite a bit of time researching products that could soften my brand new very firm mattress. I wanted one that had both memory foam and a topper of some type. This product was easy to unpack. I let the memory foam lay out and expand for about 30 minutes and wow did it expand. It fit perfectly on my king size bed. No shortages on the sides or length. The topper was a great added bonus that stretches over the memory foam and my mattress. My deep sheets fit perfectly over it. I’m very happy with this product and finally love sliding into my bed again. Great product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Ragdol9

customer_reviews.title: Excellent therapeutic topper!
customer_reviews.text: I have a severely damaged upper cirvicle with lots of pressure points in my back and because of the injuries to my neck and spinal cord I have to sleep flat on my back. I had another 4in memory foam topper that helped a lot but wore out but since I started using this topper with the pillow top it reduced almost all of the pressure on my pressure points in my back and I haven't woke up one time with the pins and needles numbness and shooting pain through my left arm and leg since I put it on my matress. Well worth the money! 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Hodgee

customer_reviews.title: Best Topper!  Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this topper!!! I wish I had bought it years ago! Have been using it for several months now. So soft, has held it's shape. I sleep so comfortable now! Love it!!!! Really quality material! No smell at all! Easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer
customer_reviews.text: Okay I had my doubts that this was going to revive my 9 year old mattress that still has good support. I'm here to say it does what it promises. Good quality foam and a great topper that is super soft. My main criticism is that once your is a sleeping position it's kinda hard to turn over but I'll take that instead of the shoulder and hip pain I was experiencing before this came along.
customer_reviews.author: Truckinkjm

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but it's not for all sleeping positions.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered based on all the good reviews, and product description, but unfortunately I did not experience the same as other buyers. It did not offer support for me. I am a side sleeper, maybe. My husband actually had to sleep in the guest room because it gave him a sore back. He is a stomach sleeper. The quality of the material appears to be very good. I am returning back to Amazon. I was so hoping this would had given me the comfort that so many other buyers experienced.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine Watson

customer_reviews.title: Like sleeping on a cloud
customer_reviews.text: I NEED a firm mattress for chronic back problems but don't like 'pinch points' causing pain on hips and shoulders. This topper is a perfect addition to my firm mattress to eliminate pinch points while maintaining the firm support I need. It is also cool in the heat and warm in the cool. (How does it know what to do???) Very much like sleeping on a cloud. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: Bruce BTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: It Grows!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the memory foam was too small for the mattress, and I would only have memory foam in the middle of my bed, without it covering edge-to-edge.....but it expands in all directions once it is unrolled. And the whole thing feels fantastic!! High quality pillow top, high quality dense foam....amazingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Amazing combination of support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I really had my doubts about how great this topper would be, but decided to give it a chance. My husband and I bought a memory foam mattress which was so stiff and uncomfortable and neither of us could sleep through the night. This topper is AMAZING! I need the support of a firm mattress for my back, but love plush and this seems to be a good combination of support and comfort. Other reviews said immediately their sleep quality improved and I second that! The first night I fell asleep and slept through the entire night. Definitely worth a try if your mattress is not 100%.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This really helped our camper mattress that was supposed to be a "residential" Simmons, but was as hard as a brick! This mattress pad with the memory foam makes that bed welcoming and comfortable in a way I didn't think it could. The mattress cover has extremely deep pockets and a very nice finish to the cotton cover. It stays on without shifting. Even helps keep the bed warm on really cold nights and cool on hot ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kaeti

customer_reviews.title: After 6 weeks, it feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get my topper and immediately put it on the bed. Unfortunately, the chemical smell from the memory foam was overwhelming at first. I was having a headache every day (which is very unusual) and realized it must be from the memory foam. I removed it and placed it on the dining room table to "air out". After 3 weeks, it still had a strong chemical smell. Finally, after 6 weeks, the smell was dissipated enough that I was able to put it back on the bed. The whole thing feels great and I sleep really well and comfortably, but I was almost ready to return it due to the smell!
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Turned my simple bed into the bed of my dreams!
customer_reviews.text: Had this mattress topper for about two weeks and we love it!! I read all the reviews carefully and had some concerns but it’s been the best purchase we have made in a long time. It sleeps like cloud and with the cover, it doesn’t get hot and I’m typically a little space heater! I thought the 4” might be too much but it’s easy to roll over. It turned our regular ole mattress into a high dollar comfy bed. The topper was fully inflated in less than 10 minutes and fit the bed perfectly. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly T. (NC)

customer_reviews.title: Saved a hard bed
customer_reviews.text: Couple of years ago bought an extra firm bed, that was a mistake! Looked for something that could help dial down that firmness and found this ViscoSoft topper. Started using it and immediately noticed difference. Previously could not sleep on side as pressure on shoulder was too much, after putting in the ViscoSoft was able to side sleep without any pressure! The only downside I noticed was the comforter was running warm, had to put two sheets on top of it to not feel hot while sleeping. That might be due to using polyester or something non-cotton to feel that hot.
customer_reviews.author: The Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for. Well worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great topper!! Exactly what we were looking for. We have an older mattress and can't really afford the one we want right now. This topper is so comfortable we may not need a new mattress for quite awhile. It expanded perfectly in only about 4 hours. It was still a little short but I easily pulled it down toward the end of the mattress until it was exactly the right size. It does not sleep hot and we would recommend it to anyone. The pillow top cover is very nice as well with plenty of loft. This topper is very comfortable for both my husband and myself.
customer_reviews.author: Christy S

customer_reviews.title: It does provide much better sleeping comfort for his bones and joints.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband who has very bad pain in a good portion of his body. He is 82. His former mattress was too firm. Since he has been sleeping on this mattress, he is sleeping better and his comfort level is very good. I hope this continues for a long duration.
customer_reviews.author: kathy beam

customer_reviews.title: So far, it is doing its job really well.
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our bed, and it has made it considerably more comfortable. It does slide around some, despite the nice corner straps to keep it in place. I can't give it 5 stars, as we have been using it for less than 6 months, so I have no idea how it will hold up. I do love that it is made in the US, and that is the primary reason I chose it (positive reviews did not hurt either!).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable topper added softness to my mattress made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I added Viscosoft 4 inch mattress topper to a new mattress that was too firm for me. The topper added the softness that I needed making sleeping possible without waking and having to switch to the couch to finish a nights rest. I have only used the topper for 4 nights so I cannot comment on the longevity of this product. I do very much appreciate this product being made in the USA and the that it arrived quicker than what was expected.
customer_reviews.author: likes to read

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This topper is awesome! I didn’t want just foam, or the memory foam..this one is the best of it all. The gel/memory foam is nice and thick and the down alternative topper is soo soft and cozy. I do feel like it made my bed slightly warmer, but it could be because my husband is a furnace at night anyway. It has made my bed much nicer as we are in need of a mattress but I don’t want to spend the money on one right now. Love this topper!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Buy only if you want to have the most wonderful night of sleep possible
customer_reviews.text: You also have to know that this is one of those toppers that you lay on and you melt into. I have found that I don’t move during the night and that I fall asleep right away. I have had problems with insomnia even when I take medication. I have stopped taking the medication and I find myself drifting off to sleep quickly and I do not move during the night. I wake up in the same position in which I fell asleep. For me this mattress topper induces sleep. And I wake up refreshed even with a nap. I am in love with this mattress topper now. If anything changes I will supplement my review.
customer_reviews.author: PuzzlePixie

customer_reviews.title: Cool and weightless
customer_reviews.text: Our mattress was a bit too firm for our liking, so I started looking for toppers. This one is both memory foam and fiber fill/fake feather. The memory foam is just thick enough without feeling like we are being eaten by the sand. The fiber topper is fluffy and cool. It took a few hours to open up, but fit perfectly fine. Don't force it. It will expand. We've been using it for a while now and it is still just as comfy as the first night. We have not had any problems with it slipping off or moving.
customer_reviews.author: EEAubieTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised with results
customer_reviews.text: While obviously sleep is a very individual thing and my results can not exactly replicate others, I have found that this product really delivers. I was expecting simply a more comfortable mattress but I found also that I get a much better night's sleep and YEEEAY little or no stiffness in the morning. I don't know how they do it but I think it is wonderful. They could use a small one page instruction on how to put together, but even without that you can fairly easily figure it out. Overall, very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Super duper soft
customer_reviews.text: I was waking up with a stiff back every night and I have a temperpedic mattress but I guess it was too hard for the time being. The reviews stated this was super soft and cushy, which I was looking for. Its exactly what I needed, you literally sink into the mattress and I love it. It helped my back quiet bit. I highly suggest if you looking for something super soft and lush. I have had it for quite sometime now and it hasnt sunk in or anything yet, so durability is great to me. worth the money and much cheaper than trying to buy a whole new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Finally sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have extensive hip, back, arm, and neck injuries from being hit by a Semi-truck. Sleeping is always a challenge. This topper has saved me. Its only been three nights of restful sleep, but I am so very happy with this product. no order, easy to unpack and get onto bed (Cali King). I look forward to going to bed now and sleeping thru the night without my legs or arms getting numb. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old foam mattress topper with this one after reading the reviews. When it first came out of the box it looked too small. Give it a few hours to open up, it is very compressed for shipping. I have spent the last few days getting the best sleep I've had all year. The mattress stays cooler than the last one I owned. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: V Balconis

customer_reviews.title: This puts new mattress purchase on back-burner...
customer_reviews.text: My issue has been pain in the morning in my hips and shoulders (side sleeper) However, since I got this mattress topper I have gotten between 98%-100% sleep quality every single night (I have a sleep program on my phone) It is so comfortable I have actually slept the entire night without moving. The only downside is that when I move after hours of sleep I notice that the spot I was in is quite warm...but not enough to make me feel sweaty. I was about to buy a new bed, but I can go with this mattress topper for probably the next couple years. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Page

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable great night sleep FINALLY
customer_reviews.text: I waited a month and half to review. I LOVE this!! It turned my husbands super hard firm Mattress into a wonderful relaxing full night sleep. I cant believe how i am finally able to sleep!! I broke my neck back in 2011 and its been a nightmare of 20 minute long sleeps all night. With this simple mattress topper i sleep through the whole night!!
customer_reviews.author: Educated Consumer NY FL

customer_reviews.title: Great Went Down Hill...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited after reading reviews about less back pain. Purchased and was pleasantly surprised with great results after sleeping on for only one week. The product is great quality and definitely has delivered what was stated but after sleeping on for only a month and half I am having back pain into hips and some in my shoulders again. Not sure yet if it's from an already worn out mattress underneath or just what but think that might still be the culprit. So before buying and thinking it is going to help completely might want to just get a new mattress instead of trying to put a Bandaide on the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Newman

customer_reviews.title: This cover has transformed my bed into the most comfortable bed I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: This product is a back saver haha! My bed was older and very firm and I couldn’t afford to spend $1000 for a newer memory foam mattress. This cover has transformed my bed into the most comfortable bed I’ve ever had. The only problem is that I don’t want to get out of bed in the morning because I’m too comfortable haha. For the price, this is one incredible product!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Howell

customer_reviews.title: Reduces vibrations from motion
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pillow top for one reason: reduce the vibrations of my partner while we sleep so I don't keep waking up every time he moves. I'm a light sleeper and he moves around a lot. It worked. We both sleep well now. It was a $200 solution to what felt like an unsolvable problem. It also didn't smell much, which was a relief. I'm very sensitive to smells. I let it air out in the living room for a day or two and then put it on the bed. It had a faint smell that has completely gone away. It's been working for us ever since.
customer_reviews.author: picky
